Squizzy::
Her body convulsed on the table.  As Zardus opened her panel, sparks 
flew out at him. Her circuits lit up inside as they tried to fight 
off the new program.  Her internal proccessors and networks were 
being flooded with the new information and tried to fight it.  Her 
body suddenly stopped moving and layed still.

Feline::
"Zardus? Will that vile of fluid put her into stasis?" She heard a 
beeping on the console. She pressed a few buttons and looked at the 
monitor. "Holy Matrix! SHe's trying to wake up!"




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus::
> 
> Zardus turns to look at the convulsing bot on the table, frowning. 
He 
> walks to a console and presses a few buttons, the programm cutting 
> itself off.
> 
> "Interesting," he mutters, reading through a log of the procedure, 
> "She isn't accepting the new programming..."
> 
> Tapping a few keys, he brings up further reports on Squizzy. Her 
> systems were designed to ressist new programming? Zardus growls, 
> looking across the room at the skinned body of Soundwave 
(Scattershot 
> took the outer armor).
> 
> "Some surgery is in order here..."
> 
> He walks over to Soundwave, detatching part after part untill he 
> holds up a computer board.
> 
> "The main proccessor," he says to Feline, walking back to Squizzy, 
> "We'll simply replace her main functions."
> 
> With that, he lays the proccessor on a table nearby, proceeding to 
> try to open Squizzy's torso.
